description: Normalized extreme values for "3x+1" trees of depth n.
references: D. Applegate and J. C. Lagarias, Distribution of 3x+1 trees, Experimental Mathematics 4 (1995),193-209.
links: J. C. Lagarias, The 3x+1 problem and its generalizations, Amer. Math. Monthly, 92 (1985), 3-23.
Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
